subject: Baseball
Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: After a lost season, the Mets got some good news Thursday when Juan Lagares was named the best center fielder in baseball, winning the annual Fielding Bible award.
snippet: After a lost season, the Mets got some good news Thursday when Juan Lagares was named the best center fielder in baseball, winning the annual Fielding Bible award.
